00010 // Check against redundant including
00011 #ifndef TT_MIXER_MONO_H
00012 #define TT_MIXER_MONO_H
00013 
00014 // Include appropriate headers
00015 #include "tt_audio_base.h"
00016 
00017 
00018 /********************************************************
00019         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00020 
00021         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00022  ********************************************************/
00023 
00024 class tt_mixer_mono:public tt_audio_base{
00025 
00026         private:
00027                 enum constants{
00028                         MAX_NUM_CHANNELS = 16,
00029                 };
00030                 tt_attribute_value              channel_gain[MAX_NUM_CHANNELS];
00031                 tt_attribute_value              master_gain;
00032                         
00033                 
00034         public:
00035                 enum selectors{                                                                         // Attribute Selectors
00036                         k_channel_gain,
00037                         k_master_gain
00038                 };
00039                 
00040                 // OBJECT LIFE                                  
00041                 tt_mixer_mono(void)                                                             // Constructor          
00042                 {
00043                         int i;
00044                         for(i=0; i<MAX_NUM_CHANNELS; i++)
00045                                 channel_gain[i] = 0.2;
00046                         master_gain = 1.0;
00047                 }
00048 
00049                 ~tt_mixer_mono(void)                                                            // Destructor
00050                 {
00051                         ;
00052                 }
00053 
00054 
00055                 // ATTRIBUTES - TWO ARGUMENTS
00056                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value_discrete chan, tt_attribute_value val)        // Set Attributes
00057                 {
00058                         switch (sel){
00059                                 case k_channel_gain:
00060                                         channel_gain[chan] = decibels_to_amplitude(val);
00061                                         break;
00062                         }
00063                 }
00064                 
00065                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value val)  // Set Attributes
00066                 {
00067                         switch (sel){
00068                                 case k_master_gain:
00069                                         master_gain = decibels_to_amplitude(val);
00070                                         break;
00071                         }
00072                 }
00073 
00074                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel)                            // Get Attributes
00075                 {
00076                         switch (sel){
00077                                 case k_master_gain:
00078                                         return amplitude_to_decibels(master_gain);
00079                                         break;  
00080                         }
00081                         return 0.0;
00082                 }
00083                 
00084                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value_discrete chan)  // Get Attributes
00085                 {
00086                         switch (sel){
00087                                 case k_master_gain:
00088                                         return amplitude_to_decibels(channel_gain[chan]);
00089                                         break;  
00090                         }
00091                         return 0.0;
00092                 }
00093                 
00094                 
00095                 // DSP LOOP - 2 CHANNELS
00096                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in1, tt_audio_signal *in2, tt_audio_signal *out)
00097                 {
00098                         temp_vs = in1->vectorsize;
00099                         while(temp_vs--)
00100                                 *out->vector++ = master_gain * ((*in1->vector++ * channel_gain[0]) + (*in2->vector++ * channel_gain[1]));
00101                         in1->reset(); in2->reset(); out->reset();
00102                 }
00103                 
00104                 // DSP LOOP - 3 CHANNELS
00105                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in1, tt_audio_signal *in2, tt_audio_signal *in3, tt_audio_signal *out)
00106                 {
00107                         temp_vs = in1->vectorsize;
00108                         while(temp_vs--)
00109                                 *out->vector++ = master_gain * ((*in1->vector++ * channel_gain[0]) + (*in2->vector++ * channel_gain[1]) + 
00110                                         (*in3->vector++ * channel_gain[2]));
00111                         in1->reset(); in2->reset(); in3->reset(); out->reset();
00112                 }
00113                 
00114                 // DSP LOOP - 4 CHANNELS
00115                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in1, tt_audio_signal *in2, tt_audio_signal *in3, tt_audio_signal *in4, 
00116                         tt_audio_signal *out)
00117                 {
00118                         temp_vs = in1->vectorsize;
00119                         while(temp_vs--)
00120                                 *out->vector++ = master_gain * ((*in1->vector++ * channel_gain[0]) + (*in2->vector++ * channel_gain[1]) + 
00121                                         (*in3->vector++ * channel_gain[2]) + (*in4->vector++ * channel_gain[3]));
00122                         in1->reset(); in2->reset(); in3->reset(); in4->reset(); out->reset();
00123                 }
00124                 
00125                 // DSP LOOP - 5 CHANNELS
00126                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in1, tt_audio_signal *in2, tt_audio_signal *in3, tt_audio_signal *in4, 
00127                         tt_audio_signal *in5, tt_audio_signal *out)
00128                 {
00129                         temp_vs = in1->vectorsize;
00130                         while(temp_vs--)
00131                                 *out->vector++ = master_gain * ((*in1->vector++ * channel_gain[0]) + (*in2->vector++ * channel_gain[1]) + 
00132                                         (*in3->vector++ * channel_gain[2]) + (*in4->vector++ * channel_gain[3]) + (*in5->vector++ * channel_gain[4]));
00133                         in1->reset(); in2->reset(); in3->reset(); in4->reset(); in5->reset(); out->reset();
00134                 }
00135                 
00136                 // DSP LOOP - 6 CHANNELS

00138                         tt_audio_signal *in5, tt_audio_signal *in6, tt_audio_signal *out)

00143                                         (*in3->vector++ * channel_gain[2]) + (*in4->vector++ * channel_gain[3]) + (*in5->vector++ * channel_gain[4]) + 
00144                                         (*in6->vector++ * channel_gain[5]));
00145                         in1->reset(); in2->reset(); in3->reset(); in4->reset(); in5->reset(); in6->reset(); out->reset();
00146                 }
00147

00269                 // DSP LOOP - 15 CHANNELS
00270                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in1, tt_audio_signal *in2, tt_audio_signal *in3, tt_audio_signal *in4, 
00271                         tt_audio_signal *in5, tt_audio_signal *in6, tt_audio_signal *in7, tt_audio_signal *in8, tt_audio_signal *in9, 
00272                         tt_audio_signal *in10, tt_audio_signal *in11, tt_audio_signal *in12, tt_audio_signal *in13, tt_audio_signal *in14, 
00273                         tt_audio_signal *in15, tt_audio_signal *out)
00274                 {
00275                         temp_vs = in1->vectorsize;
00276                         while(temp_vs--)
00277                                 *out->vector++ = master_gain * ((*in1->vector++ * channel_gain[0]) + (*in2->vector++ * channel_gain[1]) + 
00278                                         (*in3->vector++ * channel_gain[2]) + (*in4->vector++ * channel_gain[3]) + (*in5->vector++ * channel_gain[4]) + 
00279                                         (*in6->vector++ * channel_gain[5]) + (*in7->vector++ * channel_gain[6]) + (*in8->vector++ * channel_gain[7]) + 
00280                                         (*in9->vector++ * channel_gain[8]) + (*in10->vector++ * channel_gain[9]) + (*in11->vector++ * channel_gain[10])
00281                                          + (*in12->vector++ * channel_gain[11]) + (*in13->vector++ * channel_gain[12]) + (*in14->vector++ * channel_gain[13])
00282                                          + (*in15->vector++ * channel_gain[14]));
00283                         in1->reset(); in2->reset(); in3->reset(); in4->reset(); in5->reset(); in6->reset(); in7->reset(); in8->reset();
00284                         in9->reset(); in10->reset(); in11->reset(); in12->reset(); in13->reset(); in14->reset(); in15->reset();
00285                         out->reset();
00286                 }

00288                 // DSP LOOP - 16 CHANNELS
00289                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in1, tt_audio_signal *in2, tt_audio_signal *in3, tt_audio_signal *in4, 
00290                         tt_audio_signal *in5, tt_audio_signal *in6, tt_audio_signal *in7, tt_audio_signal *in8, tt_audio_signal *in9, 
00291                         tt_audio_signal *in10, tt_audio_signal *in11, tt_audio_signal *in12, tt_audio_signal *in13, tt_audio_signal *in14, 
00292                         tt_audio_signal *in15, tt_audio_signal *in16, tt_audio_signal *out)
00293                 {
00294                         temp_vs = in1->vectorsize;
00295                         while(temp_vs--)
00296                                 *out->vector++ = master_gain * ((*in1->vector++ * channel_gain[0]) + (*in2->vector++ * channel_gain[1]) + 
00297                                         (*in3->vector++ * channel_gain[2]) + (*in4->vector++ * channel_gain[3]) + (*in5->vector++ * channel_gain[4]) + 
00298                                         (*in6->vector++ * channel_gain[5]) + (*in7->vector++ * channel_gain[6]) + (*in8->vector++ * channel_gain[7]) + 
00299                                         (*in9->vector++ * channel_gain[8]) + (*in10->vector++ * channel_gain[9]) + (*in11->vector++ * channel_gain[10])
00300                                          + (*in12->vector++ * channel_gain[11]) + (*in13->vector++ * channel_gain[12]) + (*in14->vector++ * channel_gain[13])
00301                                          + (*in15->vector++ * channel_gain[14]) + (*in16->vector++ * channel_gain[15]));
00302                         in1->reset(); in2->reset(); in3->reset(); in4->reset(); in5->reset(); in6->reset(); in7->reset(); in8->reset();
00303                         in9->reset(); in10->reset(); in11->reset(); in12->reset(); in13->reset(); in14->reset(); in15->reset(); in16->reset();
00304                         out->reset();
00305                 }
